definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)
Central and Western district of Hong Kong
to combine traditional Chinese and Western medicine

sentences.english: Loess is widely distributed in China, and it mainly lies in the central and western regions.
sentences.chinese: 黃土在我國分佈廣泛，而且主要分佈在中西部地區。

sentences.english: Expressing opinions is one example of culture difference between east and west.
sentences.chinese: 表達觀點的不同是中西文化差異的一個典型例子。

sentences.english: The extracted oriental and occidental essence is embodied by a combination of undecorated quality and fashionable elements.
sentences.chinese: 提煉中西精華，不經裝飾的特質與時尚元素相結合。

sentences.english: For a long time, Hong Kong has embraced the Eastern and Western cultures.
sentences.chinese: 長期以來，中西方文化在香港相互輝映，相互交融。

sentences.english: An island of the west-central Philippines south of Luzon. It was first visited by Spaniards in1570.
sentences.chinese: 民都洛島菲律賓中西部一島嶼，位於呂宋島以南。

sentences.english: In the central and western regions, rural credit cooperatives should he defined in the policy and financial cooperation in finance.
sentences.chinese: 在中西部地區，農信社應定位於合作性金融。

sentences.english: Show Western influence, many of the buildings reflects the combination of Chinese and Western content style.
sentences.chinese: 因受西方影響，許多建築都體現了中西合璧的風格。

sentences.english: The first part on the well-being of Chinese and Western thinking and its values.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分闡述了中西幸福思想及其價值。

sentences.english: A city of west-central Honshu, Japan, north-northeast of Osaka.
sentences.chinese: 日本本州中西部一城市，位於大阪東北偏北。

sentences.english: "Tan Yi Lu, " is a ground-breaking comparison of Chinese and Western poetics.
sentences.chinese: 《談藝錄》是一部具有開創性的中西比較詩論。

sentences.english: The military band played the national anthems of China and Spain with 21 salutes lingering in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 在雄壯的21響禮炮聲中，軍樂隊演奏中西兩國國歌。

sentences.english: This is an indication of Chinese culture′s positive acculturation in the intercultural communication between China and the West.
sentences.chinese: 這是中西跨文化交際中漢語文化順涵化的標誌。

sentences.english: Warlords built private gardens in Chinese and west styles with literatus' help.
sentences.chinese: 武人在文人的幫助之下建設有中西合璧的私家園林。

sentences.english: The sun sets behind a parched tree in Mato Grosso, midwestern Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴西中西部的馬託格羅索州，被烤乾的樹後的夕陽。

sentences.english: This paper discusses on Miss Lin's novel technique-----a blend of Chinese .
sentences.chinese: 文章着重就林徽因小說中西文化交融技巧作一探析。

sentences.english: The translation activities had great influences on the cultural intercommunion.
sentences.chinese: 這種翻譯活動對於中西文化交流的影響是雙向的。

definition: harmonious combination of Chinese and Western elements (idiom)
Western learning (intellectual movement in the late Qing)/also called 洋務運動|洋务运动
the West (Europe and North America)/countries of the Indian Ocean (traditional)
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
to contain two things at a time/to mingle/to incorporate
